languages.text: {n}Человек в изысканных одеждах встречает вас необычайно лучезарной улыбкой: его тщательно отполированный челюстной имплант отражает убранство дворца не хуже зеркала.{/n} "Позвольте представиться! Я — Люссарий Кармелан, коллекционер редкостей. Возможно, Ваша Светлость найдет мои торговые предложения полезными".

{n}A finely dressed man greets you with an incredibly radiant smile. His meticulously polished jaw augmentation reflects the palace's interior as sharply as a mirror.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself! I am Lussarius Karmelan, a collector of curiosities. Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will find something useful among my offerings."
languages.original_text: {n}Человек в изысканных одеждах встречает вас необычайно лучезарной улыбкой: его тщательно отполированный челюстной имплант отражает убранство дворца не хуже зеркала.{/n} "Позвольте представиться! Я — Люссарий Кармелан, коллекционер редкостей. Возможно, Ваша Светлость найдет мои торговые предложения полезными".

His meticulously polished jaw implant is reflecting the palace's interior as sharply as a mirror.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself! I am Lussarius Karmelan, a collector of curiosities. Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will find my trade offers useful."

His meticulously polished jaw augmentation reflects the palace's interior as sharply as a mirror.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself! I am Lussarius Karmelan, a collector of curiosities. Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will find something useful among my offerings."

languages.text: {n}Ein gut gekleideter Mann begrüßt dich mit einem unglaublich strahlenden Lächeln. Seine sorgfältig polierte Kieferaugmentation reflektiert das Innere des Palasts so klar wie ein Spiegel.{/n} "Gestattet, dass ich mich vorstelle. Ich bin Lussarius Karmelan, Kuriositätensammler. Vielleicht finden Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ja etwas Nützliches in meinem Angebot."
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man greets you with an incredibly radiant smile. His meticulously polished jaw augmentation reflects the palace's interior as sharply as a mirror.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself! I am Lussarius Karmelan, a collector of curiosities. Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will find something useful among my offerings."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein gut gekleideter Mann begrüßt dich mit einem unglaublich strahlenden Lächeln. Seine sorgfältig polierte Kieferaugmentation reflektiert das Innere des Palasts so klar wie ein Spiegel.{/n} "Gestattet, dass ich mich vorstelle. Ich bin Lussarius Karmelan, Kuriositätensammler. Vielleicht finden Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ja etwas Nützliches in meinem Angebot."

languages.text: {n}Un homme élégant vous accueille avec un sourire éblouissant. Son augmentation mandibulaire soigneusement polie reflète l'intérieur du palais comme un miroir.{/n} « Permettez-moi de me présenter ! Je m'appelle Lussarius Karmelan, je collectionne les curiosités. L'un de mes articles intéressera peut-être Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man greets you with an incredibly radiant smile. His meticulously polished jaw augmentation reflects the palace's interior as sharply as a mirror.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself! I am Lussarius Karmelan, a collector of curiosities. Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will find something useful among my offerings."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme élégant vous accueille avec un sourire éblouissant. Son augmentation mandibulaire soigneusement polie reflète l'intérieur du palais comme un miroir.{/n} « Permettez-moi de me présenter ! Je m'appelle Lussarius Karmelan, je collectionne les curiosités. L'un de mes articles intéressera peut-être Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}一位衣着考究的男子向你致意，脸上挂着无比灿烂的迷人笑容。他精心抛光过的下巴植入物仿佛镜子一般，清晰地倒映着宫殿的内部装潢。{/n}“请允许我自我介绍一下！我叫卢萨利乌斯·卡梅兰，热衷于收藏奇珍，大人您或许可以在我的藏品中找到有用的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man greets you with an incredibly radiant smile. His meticulously polished jaw augmentation reflects the palace's interior as sharply as a mirror.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself! I am Lussarius Karmelan, a collector of curiosities. Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will find something useful among my offerings."

traits.locale_text: {n}一位衣着考究的男子向你致意，脸上挂着无比灿烂的迷人笑容。他精心抛光过的下巴植入物仿佛镜子一般，清晰地倒映着宫殿的内部装潢。{/n}“请允许我自我介绍一下！我叫卢萨利乌斯·卡梅兰，热衷于收藏奇珍，大人您或许可以在我的藏品中找到有用的东西。”

languages.text: {n}Un hombre de vestimenta elegante te saluda con una sonrisa increíblemente radiante. Su mandíbula aumentada, pulida meticulosamente, refleja el interior del palacio con la nitidez de un espejo.{/n} «¡Permita que me presente! Soy Lussarius Karmelan, coleccionista de curiosidades. Tal vez mi{mf|lord|lady} encuentre algo de utilidad entre mis artículos».
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man greets you with an incredibly radiant smile. His meticulously polished jaw augmentation reflects the palace's interior as sharply as a mirror.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself! I am Lussarius Karmelan, a collector of curiosities. Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will find something useful among my offerings."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre de vestimenta elegante te saluda con una sonrisa increíblemente radiante. Su mandíbula aumentada, pulida meticulosamente, refleja el interior del palacio con la nitidez de un espejo.{/n} «¡Permita que me presente! Soy Lussarius Karmelan, coleccionista de curiosidades. Tal vez mi{mf|lord|lady} encuentre algo de utilidad entre mis artículos».

languages.text: {n}身なりの整った男が、非常に輝かしい笑顔であなたを迎えた。入念に磨かれた顎のオーグメティックは、宮殿の内部を鏡のように鮮明に映し出していた。{/n}「自己紹介させていただきます！私はルッサリウス・カルメラン、珍品の収集家です。おそらく、私の品揃えの中で閣下に役立つものが見つかることでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man greets you with an incredibly radiant smile. His meticulously polished jaw augmentation reflects the palace's interior as sharply as a mirror.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself! I am Lussarius Karmelan, a collector of curiosities. Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will find something useful among my offerings."

traits.locale_text: {n}身なりの整った男が、非常に輝かしい笑顔であなたを迎えた。入念に磨かれた顎のオーグメティックは、宮殿の内部を鏡のように鮮明に映し出していた。{/n}「自己紹介させていただきます！私はルッサリウス・カルメラン、珍品の収集家です。おそらく、私の品揃えの中で閣下に役立つものが見つかることでしょう」

languages.text: {n}İnce zevkle giyinmiş bir adam, olağanüstü parlak bir gülümsemeyle seni selamlıyor. Özenle parlatılmış çene ogmentasyonu, sarayın iç mekânını bir ayna misali yansıtıyor.{/n} "Kendimi tanıtmama izin verin! Ben Lussarius Karmelan, antika koleksiyoncusuyum. Belki {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, aradıkları bir şeyi sunduklarım arasında bulur."
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man greets you with an incredibly radiant smile. Perhaps Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will find something useful among my offerings."
